quote: When you want to arrive at your goal more than you want to be doing what you're doing, you become stressed.
author: Eckhart Tolle, A New Earth: Awakening to Your Life's Purpose

quote: Maybe not here and now, but somewhere, someday.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes

quote: Your definition of a good life does not have to look like everyone else thinks it should. Whatever feels right for you, whatever aligns your inside with your outside, that's what you should spend your time doing.
author: G.G. Renee Hill
tags: alignment, dreams, fulfillment, goals, good-life, happiness, life, passion, peace, purpose

quote: Everything begins with failing. If you stop to fail, then your failing to stop, to try and try again, and bring success.
author: Anthony Liccione
tags: dont-give-up, dreams, endure, failure, goals, letting-go, plans, success, try-and-try-again, work-hard

quote: Your problem is in thinking the sky's the limit. Why set limits?
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
tags: aims, ambition, dreams, goals, hopes, limits, objectives, objectives-of-life, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, target, wishes

quote: The goal was never dependent on the route that took me there. It was always dependent on the heart that got me through whatever route opened itself up to my efforts.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing

quote: Goals are only ever a guide; a winding, changing path. It's your heart that will really keep you on tack... and nourished along the way.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru
tags: acceptance, finding-your-path-in-life, following-your-heart, goals, inspiring-quotes-on-life, letting-go, life-path, quotes-on-goals, quotes-on-happiness, rasheed-ogunlaru-quotes, setting-goals

quote: World is full of people waiting to pursue their passion, if given a chance. Unfortunately, the "chance" will not be given, it needs to be earned.
author: Manoj Arora, From the Rat Race to Financial Freedom

quote: The difference between superlative pie and a wish for cake is crust. Understand that pie is a generous but self-centered substance. It likes attention, not affection. Do not hug your crust. Do not rub its back or five its high. Don't fuss with refrigerators every step oft he way. Keep the water and butter cold, and remember what a wise baker once said: The goal is pie.
author: Kate Lebo, A Commonplace Book of Pie
tags: baking, beginnings, cake, crust, goals, pastry, pie, poetry, prose-poetry

quote: Sometimes we make being happy so difficult.And being thankful such a chore. Starting the day like a job we hate. Beginning it like swallowing ten tablespoons of devil made cough syrup.Because, somehow, along the way, we forget that being alive and healthy and happy are noble goals – or just good ideas.And that the opposite of being alive is being dead. What a choice.
author: Carew Papritz, The Legacy Letters: his Wife, his Children, his Final Gift
tags: be-happy, being-alive, being-dead, book-quotes, carew-papritz, goals, happiness, healthy, inspirational-quote, the-legacy-letters

quote: A little here and a little there will always accumulate, so why be surprised when steady, small steps take you to great places?
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
tags: accumulate, achievements, goals, progress, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, small-steps, step-by-step

quote: Every day is precious. You will never live THIS day again. It is ONE event in human history. Why not make it count? Time is a nonrenewable resource.
author: Kristen Lamb

quote: When you have a goal, there will also be a result.
author: Mohiro Kitoh, Kare no Satsujin Keikaku

quote: Today I will do one small task that will contribute toward the achievement of a life goal.
author: Kitt Weagant, Each Day a New Beginning: Daily Meditations for Women

quote: You miss 100% of the shots that you don't take. Still wondering whether it is worth giving a shot at your dreams?
author: Manoj Arora, From the Rat Race to Financial Freedom

quote: Whenever you think seriously to achieve something, just take one advise : Think on Paper
author: Manoj Arora, From the Rat Race to Financial Freedom

quote: If your dreams and goals get derailed, they're not dead. Derailed simply means off-track. Pick 'em up and put 'em back on again.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing

quote: Just like going to the moon made us learn more about earth, achieving your goals will make you learn more about yourself and get fascinated.
author: Samer Chidiac

quote: Starting a new way is never easy so...keep starting until the start sticks.
author: Tim Fargo
tags: achievement, achievements-and-attitude, beginnings, finding-your-way, finding-yourself, goal, goal-setting, goals, inspiration, inspirational, motivation, motivational, motivational-quote, renew, renewal, seeking

quote: I chase goals, not girls.
author: Amit Kalantri
tags: 20th-century, 20th-century-quotes, arrogance, attitude, chase, chasing-love, fun, funny, funny-quotes, girl, girls, goal, goal-setting, goals, human, humans, inspiration, inspirational, inspirational-quotes, love-hurts, modern, modern-quotations, modernism, modernity, motivation, motivational, motivational-quotes, philosophy, pride, proud, wisdom, wisdom-quotes, wit, witty, witty-quotes

quote: We're going to change. We're going to throw out what's worse in usand keep what's best. But come hell or high water, we three will sticktogether, all for one, one for all. We're going to grow, Cathy,physically, mentally, and emotionally. Not only that, we're going toreach the goals we've set for ourselves. I'll be the best damneddoctor the world's ever known and you will make Pavlova seem like anawkward country girl.
author: V.C. Andrews, Flowers in the Attic
tags: change, emotion, emotional, goals, mental, physical

quote: Perhaps there’s no better act of simplification than climbing a mountain. For an afternoon, a day, or a week, it’s a way of reducing a complicated life into a simple goal. All you have to do is take one step at a time, place one foot in front of the other, and refuse to turn back until you’ve given everything you have.
author: Ken Ilgunas, Walden on Wheels: On the Open Road from Debt to Freedom

quote: Doing nothing accomplishes nothing, gains nothing, changes nothing, and wins nothing. You have to make a move.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
tags: accomplishing, attempt, changing, goals, motivation, move, nothing, resolutions, richelle, try, win

quote: There are two types of people in this world- those who pull out of bed each morning at the thought of breakfast and those who are driven by ambition. The former succeed in satisfying hunger pangs and the latter accomplish their life goals.
author: Roopleen
tags: accomplish, ambition, driven, goals, hunger, inspiration, inspire, life, motivation, quotes, succeed, success, wisdom

quote: The denial of assistance is sometimes the greatest assistance. The trick is recognizing when this is the case.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
tags: assistance, charity, drive, goals, help, incentive, motivation, motive, richelle, richelle-goodrich, self-esteem, self-sufficiency

quote: You'll never reach your destination if you stop to throw stones at every dog that barks.
author: Windston Churchill

quote: In constant view keeps mightily true an honest resolve to do.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Making Wishes
tags: achieving, focus, goals, richelle, richelle-goodrich, success

quote: Went to bed with a dream.Woke up with a purpose.
author: JohnA Passaro

quote: When you make a solid commitment to restructure the spiritual vitality in yourself, there is no end to the healing that you can experience in all areas of your life
author: Sereda Aleta Dailey, The Magnificent Weight Loss System

quote: Make a list of goals for every year, tick them off & reward yourself when you achieve each one. Will give much discipline in your life.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quote: I think the sense of family and family achievement, plus the discipline which I received there from that one-room school were really very helpful in what I did later on.
author: Alan Shepard
tags: accomplishments, achievement, discipline, family, goals, inspirational

quote: Don't wait for a future moment
author: the time is NOW! The life of your dreams awaits... UN-ASS the couch and go get it!

quote: A goal is a specific objective that you either achieve or don't sometime in the future. A system is something you do on a regular basis that increases your odds of happiness in the long run. If you do something every day, its a system. If you're waiting to achieve it someday in the future, it's a goal. If you achieve your goal, you celebrate and feel terrific, but only until you realize you just lost the thing that gave you purpose and direction. Your options are to feel empty and useless, perhaps enjoying the spoils of your success until they bore you, or set new goals and reenter the cycle of permanent presuccess failure. All I'm suggesting is that thinking of goals and systems as very different concepts has power. Goal-oriented people exist in a state of continuous presuccess failure at best, and permanent failure at worst if things never work out. Systems people succeed every time they apply their systems, in the sense that they did what they intended to do. The goals people are fighting the feeling of discouragement at each turn. The systems people are feeling good everytime they apply their system. That's a big difference in terms of maintaining your personal energy in the right direction.
author: Scott Adams, How to Fail at Almost Everything and Still Win Big: Kind of the Story of My Life

quote: The only ship you can truly steer in this ocean is the one you're sailing. Quit trying to alter the winds
author: harness them.

quote: Never allow reality to get in the way of your dreams.
author: Mark W. Boyer
tags: boyer, dreams-inspirational, goals, inspirational, mark-boyer, motivational-inspirational

quote: Action separates the heroes from the cowards, the achievers from the complainers, the successful from the mere dreamers, the happy from the envious; it separates those who rise to the challenge of their goals from the haters who cower in the shadow of stagnancy.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Don't expect people to understand your purpose when God didn't give them your vision.
author: Turcois Ominek
tags: goals, god, inspiration, inspirational, inspirational-quotes, purpose, religion, truth, vision

quote: Obsession and desperation for your goal, gets you the goal.
author: Amit Kalantri
tags: aim, desperate, desperation, goal, goals, human, humans, inspiration, inspirational, inspirational-quotes, motivation, motivational, motivational-quotes, obsession, philosophy, success, successful, target, wisdom, wisdom-quotes

quote: Dreams aren't finish lines to be reached at the close of a race. They don't suddenly materialize, fulfilled, where the road ends. The entire journey is included in the dream―all of it from beginning to forevermore. You're on that journey right now; hence, you're living the dream. Enjoy it.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
tags: ambitions, aspiration, desires, dreams, goals, hopes, journey, mission, objective, richelle, richelle-goodrich, road

quote: So he said, 'What would you like to do? What is your desire really?' I said, 'Doctor, I don't think you're going to find this very healthy and clear, but I really would like to stop working forever–never work again, never do anything like the kind of work I’m doing now–and do nothing but write poetry and have leisure to spend the day outdoors and go to museums and see friends.
author: Allen Ginsberg

quote: True, luck may rule over parts of a person's life and luck may cast patches of shadow across the ground of our being, but where there's a WILL-- much less a strong will to swim thirty laps or run twenty kilometers -- there's a way to overcome most any trouble with whatever stepladders you have around.
author: Haruki Murakami, The Elephant Vanishes

quote: Procrastinating to embark on your passion is a risky business, because tomorrow may never come!
author: Alex Zar

quote: The whole point to New Years is not just to have a new year. But that we should be new, better and different people. That is why we exercise to RE-NEW our bodies. That is why we write GOALS to get a Renewed sense of our potential. That is why we make RE-SOLUTIONS because we resolve that there are solutions inside of us that we have not tapped into. So don't waste each New Years season. Maximize it! Start fresh using a new perspective for it will enable you to tap into a new season with greater capacity.
author: Stella Payton
tags: capacity, do-over, exercise, goals, maximize, new-years-eve, potential, renewed, resolution

quote: Success is not certain until you are obsessed by your goal
author: Vijay Dhameliya
tags: goals, inspirational, leadership, management, motivational, success

quote: There's no point in being committed to a vision if you're not equally committed to making it a reality.
author: Tim Fargo, Alphabet Success - Keeping it Simple
tags: commitment, commitment-and-attitude, goal, goal-setting, goals, vision, visionary

quote: Dreamers dream the dream, Artists live it.
author: Mark W. Boyer
tags: artists, boyer, dreams, goals, inspirational, mark-boyer

quote: Evidently one endures anything, provided one has a goal.
author: Sándor Márai, Embers

quote: We all have goals and dreams. Say them aloud to yourself
author: if they don’t sound slightly impossible then they aren’t set high enough.

quote: A goal without real consequences is wishful thinking. Good follow-through doesn't depend on the right intentions. It depends on the right incentives.
author: Timothy Ferriss, The 4-Hour Chef: The Simple Path to Cooking Like a Pro, Learning Anything, and Living the Good Life

quote: Squeeze this amazing human experience for all its nourishing juices. Take action towards the life you see for yourself. Don’t just look to the sky and beg for it
author: put your feet on the ground and create it!
tags: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Actions without a dream serve you no purpose, Dreams without action merely pass the time, however, a Dream set into motion….the future has no boundaries.
author: Mark W. Boyer
tags: boyer, dreams, goals, inspirational-quotes, mark-boyer, taking-charge

quote: Peace, love and beauty are goals shared by every human heart. The question is whether our minds recognize them as such.
author: Raheel Farooq
tags: aspirations, beauty, goals, humanity, humans, love, mankind, peace

quote: When you are touched by a calling, answer on the first ring. As time passes the volume decreases until it is silenced forever by our allotted time.
author: Carl Henegan, Darkness Left Undone

quote: Conclude that your are worth achieving beyond your expectations
author: Gino Norris, Stress Diary Journal
tags: achievement, gino-norris, goals, inspiration, motivation, perseverance, stress-dairy, your-worth

quote: While I do not believe in imperative goals or ends, I do believe in a returning endgame. When you reach one end, it should be for conception. When you reach the next end, it should be for immortality. One should reach the state of existing and non-existing at the same time. One's goals and endgame should be metaphysical and pataphysical, stepping over the edge of logic and reason. If you are not reaching to step above... then you belong at the bottom.

quote: Th e average person spends much of his or her lifetime buildingfinancial security, but it can be lost, never to be regained. That’swhy you need to carefully assess your definition of financialsecurity and make sure it is realistic for the goals that you haveset. You can take the necessary steps to put that plan in place,and never lose that financial security, and to pass on your valuesand assets to the coming generations.
author: Christopher K. Abts

quote: Having a goal and having a dream are different.
author: N.N. Porchezhiyan

quote: Set your end goal...the steps in between - is your path
author: Gino Norris, Stress Diary Journal
tags: behaviour, focus, gino-norris, goals, inspiration, inspired, motivation, progress, setting-goals, stress-diary

quote: Don’t say you don’t have enough time or enough money to change the world. You have exactly the same number of hours per day that were given to Helen Keller, Gandhi, Michelangelo, Mother Teresa, Leonardo da Vinci and Jesus Christ.

tags: activism, attention, beethoven, choices, christ, christianity, copeouts, create-music, dance, destinations, dream-big, dreams, excuses, focus, gandhi, gifts, goals, helen-keller, inspire, invent, journeys, leonardo-da-vinci, michelangelo, mother-teresa, procastination, pushing-yourself, serve, stop-settling, talents, teach, write-books

quote: Value all relationships for the lessons they teach. Make sure you learn the lessons well. If not you will repeat those mistakes over and over.Focus on the kind of relationship you do want! Surround yourself with people who manifest those characteristics. Avoid and eliminate negativity at all cost.Become a producer of that which is positive.Look for the good in every situation and praise it. talk about it & be about it. Be about only good things.Create and manifest around you joy and peace and happiness. Let the presence of God be your model. Gods' kingdom consists of 3 things, righteousness, peace and joy in Gods words. When you become a positive producer, you will begin to attract what you produced ---- positives!

tags: become, character, create, focus, goals, good, lessons, mistakes, negativity, positive, praise, relationships, repeat, situation, things, values-in-life

quote: So long as we do not know definitely what we want, our forces will be scattered, and so long as our forces are scattered, we will accomplish but little, or fail entirely. When we know what we want, however, and proceed to work for it with all the power and ability that is in us, we may rest assured that we will get it. When we direct the power of thinking, the power of will, the power of mental action, the power of desire, the power of ambition, in fact, all the power we possess on the one thing we want, on the one goal we desire to reach, it is not difficult to understand why success in a greater and greater measure must be realized.
author: Christian D. Larson
tags: desire, determination, direction, focus, goals, thinking, thought

quote: It is never wise to run any race but your own.
author: Tim Fargo
tags: focus, goal-setting, goals, priorities, reflection, running, success, success-coaching, think, winning, wisdom, wise

quote: Imagine what your life would be like if you were completely uninhibited by fear, pride, or procrastination. What would you be capable of? Anything.

quote: It has never been my goal to impress anyone but myself. That has proven challenging enough.

quote: Repeatedly I have been impressed to learn that to reach a goal never before attained, one must do things never before done.

quote: No one stands at the beginning of a race and then finds himself at the end having never taken a step forward. And if that were to happen—the sweat and struggle avoided—what stories would he have to tell? The goal includes the journey

quote: I could get through this. I would be strong because I was so close to achieving my dream of having my kids together.

quote: You can’t reach the destination which you don’t know. So what’s the use of hard work when you don’t know where it’s taking you?

quote: Unless you realize that there is a sun beyond comprehension of this limited mind... the life shall remain confined within a Box...
author: Dinesh Kumar, Destiny Re scripted

quote: If high aspirations = high fear, overcoming high fear = achieving high aspirations.

tags: achieve, achievement, achieving-dreams, achieving-excellence, achieving-success, aspirations, fear, fearless, fears, goals, inspiration, inspirational-quote

quote: Stop throwing away days, weeks, months, and years by simply day-dreaming about what you wish your life would be.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: When a goal matters enough to a person, that person will find a way to accomplish what at first seemed impossible.

quote: They say it's impossible.I refuse to believe it. The journey may be difficult and the desired end unlikely. My patience and commitment may be tested by something that won't happen overnight. It may be that I veer off the path or quit before reaching my goal, but that doesn't mean it is impossible.

tags: aims, goals, impossible, richelle, richelle-goodrich, struggles

quote: Knowing the path through the forest doesn't make the trip any less daunting. Knowing the steps to your dreams doesn't make the climb any less of a challenge.

quote: We have the ability to write the blueprint for our own goals, and decide how we want to pursue them. If we allow others to do it for us, we won’t achieve our full potential to be the best we can be.

quote: Human progress is achieved by taking exact measurements.

quote: If I had a dream or a goal… then maybe I would be able to overcome the obstacles in my way.
author: Paradise Kiss
tags: anime, dreams, goals, life, manga, paradise-kiss, yuriko

quote: Get-rich-quick schemes are for the lazy & unambitious. Respect your dreams enough to pay the full price for them.

quote: Your dreams are a poetic reflection of your soul's wishes. Be courageous enough to follow them.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: I've never felt that the American Dream was owed to me. I never felt that I was entitled to this Dream. This is why I laid the cobblestone before me for this Dream to be achieved.
author: John-Talmage Mathis, I Deal to Plunder - A ride through the boom town
tags: achievement, american-dream, defeat, goals, hard-work, life, purpose

quote: She hadn't realized how much she'd needed a dream, but it had transformed her, changed her from poor motherless and abandoned Tully to a girl poised to take on the world. The goal made her life story unimportant, gave her something to reach for, to hang on to
author: Kristin Hannah, Firefly Lane

quote: Be amongst the few who dare to follow their dreams.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: dreams, goals, inspirational, life, motivational, success

quote: The fulfillment of your dreams lies within you and you alone.When you understand and accept this then nothing, or no one can deny you greatness.
author: JohnA Passaro

quote: Perfection is an everlasting goal to pursue. It reminds us that we are mortal beings capable of making mistakes. When we correct them, it gives us an opportunity to become better people.
author: Ellen J. Barrier
tags: goals, mistakes, mortal, opportunity, people, perfection

quote: Your employees' ability to take satisfying and productive steps towards career goals is directly proportionate to their self-awareness.
author: Julie Winkle Giulioni, Help Them Grow or Watch Them Go: Career Conversations Employees Want

quote: Big dreams and perseverance are a powerful duo.
author: J.P. Stonestreet

quote: To set goals and pursue them, we must have a desire to dream of things some would think to be impossible.
author: Ellen J. Barrier

quote: Hope is the foundation for which all successful goals are built upon.
author: Ellen J. Barrier

quote: The reason most people never reach their goals is that they don't define them, or ever seriously consider them as achievable.
author: Ziad K. Abdelnour, Economic Warfare: Secrets of Wealth Creation in the Age of Welfare Politics

quote: It is in fact the height of selfishness to merely consume what others create and to retreat into a shell of limited goals and immediate pleasures.
author: Robert Greene, Mastery

quote: Keep your standards even when everyone around you is losing theirs.
author: Habeeb Akande
tags: aim-high, ambition, dedication, desire, determination, drive, expectations, goals, high-standards, inspirational, motivational, standards, success

quote: The reason people fail to reach their goals is because they give up too early. They don't understand that most successes are built upon foundations of multiple attempts.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
tags: accomplishment, achievement, failure, gain, goals, good-luck, progress, richelle, richelle-goodrich, success

quote: Try not to be a man or woman of success, but rather a man or woman of inspiration. If you’re successful, they will flock to you for money or fame, but if you’re inspirational, they will flock to you because they love your soul and how you change theirs.
author: Shannon L. Alder
tags: achievements, aspirations, fame, goals, goodness, inspirational, life-choices, life-mission, life-purpose, life-pursuits, money, pursuits, success, truth

quote: Always having what we wantmay not be the best good fortuneHealth seems sweetestafter sickness, foodin hunger, goodnessin the wake of evil, and at the endof daylong labor sleep.
author: Heraclitus, Fragments

quote: I’m not going to miss 95% of life to weigh 5% less.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing
tags: appearance, body-image, fitness, goals, life, weight, weight-loss

quote: Finally there are those who saw at once that the question was a trap. There is no answer. Instead of wasting time grappling with that trap. They decide to act. They look to their childhood and look for what filled them with enthusiasm then and disregarding the advice of their elders, devote their life to it. Because enthusiasm is the sacred fire. They slowly discover, their actions are linked to a mysterious impulse beyond human knowledge. And they bow their heads as a sign of respect for that mystery and pray that they will not be diverted from a path they do not know, a path which they have chosen to travel because of the flame burning in their hearts. They use their intuition when they can and resort to discipline when intuition fails them. They seem quite mad. And sometimes they behave like mad people. But they are not mad. They have discovered true love and will. And those two things reveal the goal and the direction that they should follow. Their will is crystalline, their love is pure and their steps determined. In moments of doubt or sadness they never forget: I am an instrument, allow me to be an instrument capable of manifesting your will. They have chosen their road, and they may understand what their goal is only when they find themselves before the unwanted visitor. That is the beauty of the person who continues onward with enthusiasm and respect for the mystery of life as his only guide. His road is beautiful, and his burden light. The goal will be large or small, it can be far away or right next door. He goes in search of it with respect and honor. He knows what each step means, and how much it costs in effort and training and intuition. He focuses not just on the goal to be reached but on everything happening around him. He often has to stop because his strength fails him. At such moments, love appears and says: You think you're heading toward a specific point, but the whole justification for the goals existence lies in your love for it. Rest a little. But as soon as you can, get up and carry on. Because ever since your goal found out that you were traveling toward it, it has been running to meet you.
author: Paulo Coelho
tags: advice, advice-of-daily-living, dharma, goals, inspiration, inspirational, love

quote: Maybe there is no such thing as success—a final destination where you arrive once and for all. Maybe existence is a never-ending journey of peaks and valleys and forever chasing dreams.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
tags: goals, hopes, journey, life, meaning, richelle, richelle-goodrich, success, trials

quote: I am, for some reason, actually happy with who I am and the muscle, the bones, and the flub that exist beneath these clothes.I don’t need to lose 20 lbs. to be attractive.I don’t need to starve myself of the good things of life to be healthy.And, I don’t need to chase someone else’s ideal of what I should be looking like.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing
tags: appearance, body-image, fitness, goals, life, weight, weight-loss

quote: Today I will find something beautiful.Delicate pink blossoms on a cherry tree.The dove resting near the lemon buds.Sunbeams smiling from sky to earth.Smiling on me."Creating" in BREATHE IN
author: Eileen Granfors

quote: It isn't a brute instinct that keeps us restless and dissatisfied. I'll tell you what it is: it's the highest goal of man - the need to grow and advance . . . to find new things . . . to expand. To spread out, reach areas, experiences, comprehend and live in an evolving fashion. To push aside routine and repetition, to break out of mindless monotony and thrust forward. To keep moving on . . .
author: Philip K. Dick, Solar Lottery

quote: The real achievers are those who, in the dreary pit of sacrifice, still smile up at the goal.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
tags: accomplishments, achievers, aims, ambition, goals, richelle, richelle-goodrich, sacrifice, struggles

quote: Think of the most discouraging thing that you are currently carrying or the biggest project you can’t seem to tackle. Forget about how it happened, forget about how you got there, just look at the clock, and before that number changes, do one little thing to make it better. After you do, enjoy your moment of victory, and then do it again. In less than the time it takes you to blink, the past will burden you no more.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing
tags: change, changing-ourselves, goals, our-pasts, overcoming-negativity, overcoming-obstacles, procrastination, self-mastery, time

quote: The skinnier and more toned I got, the fatter I felt.The more in shape I got, the more out of shape I felt like I was.And the more I made myself look good to the masses, the less attractive I felt like I was.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing
tags: appearance, body-image, fitness, goals, life, weight, weight-loss

quote: I’ve been chained to my bathroom scale for two decades now. I’ve used the number on my scale to tell me if I’m valuable or not. I’ve let the number on my scale destroy many beautiful opportunities in my life such as scheduling family photos, having fun at the beach, or giving myself 100% in intimacy. I’ve let the number on the scale tell me if I should be confident in who I am. I’ve let the number on the scale tell me if I am worthy of kind thoughts from others. Ultimately, I’ve always let some ridiculous number on the bathroom scale tell me whether or not I should love myself.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing
tags: appearance, body-image, fitness, goals, life, weight, weight-loss

quote: I enjoy a torture session on the rowing machine and I also enjoy my mom’s homemade peach cobbler. I enjoy flopping like that dead fish with hips that can’t lie in dance class, and I also enjoy ordering pizza with my kid, renting a movie, and downing popcorn while we share some special time together. I enjoy seeing how much I can lift at the gym and I also enjoy stuffing a fresh chewy chocolate chip cookie into my face when I’m having a hard day.
author: Dan Pearce, Single Dad Laughing
tags: appearance, body-image, fitness, goals, life, weight, weight-loss

quote: My spirit mirrors the radiance of a clear, blue sky. With closed eyes I lift my face and smile, warmed from the core and from above. All hopes and dreams compete with this endless expanse of heaven, desiring the clock of eternity. I reach with my hands―frenziedly achieving―attempting to learn and do all. Yet I understand the humble truth; a drop of rain shall amount to my contribution among all the droplets in the vast ocean of human history. It is a pure and precious tear that seeps from my efforts....my exist
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
tags: accomplishments, achieving, contributions, desires, goals, history-of-mankind, life, poetry, richelle, richelle-goodrich

quote: Intelligence is the key to achieve your dreams.
author: Jennifer I. Lim

quote: If you don't know where you are going, you will surely arrive there.
author: Ann D. Clark, Women & Recovery: Sex, Sobriety & Stepping Up: Practical Suggestions for Quality Living in Recovery

quote: If you have goals and procrastination, you have nothing. If you have goals and you take action, you will have anything you want.
author: Thomas J. Vilord

quote: You grow (and thrive!) by doing what excitesyou and what scares you everyday, not bytrying to find your passion.
author: Derek Sivers
tags: changing, find, goal, goals, life, lost, passion

quote: We have to imagine our dreams becoming reality. We must keep pursuing them and reaching beyond for future achievements. We never stop dreaming as long as we imagine.
author: Ellen J. Barrier

quote: Grind until you get it no matter what the haters say and never look back, keep striving cause its your life.
author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett
tags: 2013, goals, grind, haters-hate, john-blake, life, money

quote: Insure your reading is in alignment with your goals. Read everything you can find on your goals and your profession. It's the best investment you can make.
author: Mark Matteson, Freedom from Fear

quote: I want my life to be the greatest story. My very existence will be the greatest poem.Watch me burn.Love always, Charlotte
author: Charlotte Eriksson, Empty Roads & Broken Bottles; in search for The Great Perhaps
tags: become, dreams, existence, goals, growing-up, inspiration, journey, last-words, leaving, life, life-story, london, love, motivation, poetry, solitude, story, the-great-perhaps, travelling, writer

quote: It's about personal development. It's about creating your own character and pushing it to the limit. It's about pushing yourself so far out of your own and everybody else's idea of who you are and what you're capable of, that you no longer believe in limits. It's about reaching beyond your so-called potential, because your potential is never where you or anyone else expects it to be, not even close. It's about being able to say with the last breath of your life “I used all my potential and all my talents and pushed myself to the limit. I could not have fought any harder.
author: Charlotte Eriksson, Empty Roads & Broken Bottles; in search for The Great Perhaps
tags: autobiography, character-development, fighting-spirit, goals, independent, inspiration, motivation, musician, prose, self-development, self-growth

quote: Do not postpone what's important to you simply because others don't share your priorities
author: Hemal Jhaveri

quote: When you wake up each morning with a burning passion to accomplish a goal, you've already won the day.
author: George Alexiou
tags: achievement, change, goals, happiness, humility, inspirational, integrity, joy, motivational, passion, success

quote: Sometimes in this life, only one or two opportunities are put before us and we must seize them no matter the risk.
author: Andre Dubus III, House of Sand and Fog
tags: goals, inspirational, lessons-in-life, life, motivational, opportunity

quote: The BIG push means being able to develop and sustain momentum toward your goal; it is the process of actively replacing excuses with winning habits, the ultimate excuses blockers. Moreover, it is being willing to go to the wall for what you want or believe in, to push beyond your previous mental and physical limits, no matter what it takes.
author: Lorii Myers, No Excuses, The Fit Mind-Fit Body Strategy Book

quote: Knowing the path to follow doesn't make it a breeze to step along. If every desire were only a skip, hop, and a jump away, we'd all have arrived.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
tags: desires, destination, goals, life, richelle, richelle-goodrich, struggles, trials

quote: No more excuses or procrastination! Stop allowing your days to be stolen by busy nothingness and take calculated steps towards your goals.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: You are successful when you accomplish the goals and dreams you set for yourself.
author: Brenda Johnson Padgitt
tags: acomplishment, brenda-johnson-padgitt, dreams, goals, success, tasks

quote: Resolutions are most often empty promises for those who have an abundance of dreams, but refuse to wake up and live them.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: An aspirational diet will have you dreaming of success; but it’s the attachment of expectations and tangible goals that feeds the desire, persistence, and fortitude required to make the win.
author: Lorii Myers, No Excuses, The Fit Mind-Fit Body Strategy Book
tags: aspirations, desire, expectations, fortitude, goals, golf, no-excuses, persistence, success, the-win

quote: The journey of success requires a map for effective navigation. Establish a destination by defining what you want. Once you have a destination, take physical action by making choices that move you towards that destination.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: action, choices, goals, journey, map, success

quote: It is important for all of us to understand that free people are not governed by rules. Here at Hillsdale we are governed by goals, and then the rules are very broad.
author: Larry P. Arnn

quote: We’re a society that creates super heroes who aren’t really super heroes. They are just regular people who live in alignment with their goals and dreams. They don’t just talk about it, the LIVE it. You can choose to do the same.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: choices, dreams, goals, life, success, super-heroes

quote: Dare to believe that good things are possible when you follow your heart.
author: Bryant McGill, Voice of Reason

quote: Your actions must reflect your goals in order to experience true success. Don't just wish, DO! Don't just dream, BE! Let today be the day you create a plan and follow it.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Let today be the day you finally stop having a conflict between your actions and your goals. When you align your greatest intent with purposeful action, you create a universal symphony serenading your success!
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: A sense of accomplishment comes when you have completed the tasks for the goals you have set for yourself.
author: Brenda Johnson Padgitt

quote: Be creative and daring in your dreams and the steps you take to bring them to fruition.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Do not question your ability or worthiness. God is a universe of purpose-driven balance. If you have been called to action, it is because you have it within you to rise to the challenge of your calling. Now, RISE to it!
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: action, balance, challenge, dreams, goals, god, life

quote: Like a gift, beautifully wrapped at the foot of your bed each morning, today asks that you open it and enjoy everything inside. Exhaust yourself with all it has to offer!
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: bed, dreams, gift, goals, life, morning, new-day, success

quote: Life seems to be a process of replacing one anxiety with another and substituting one desire for another--which is not to say that we should never strive to overcome any of our anxieties or fulfil any of our desires, but rather to suggest that we should perhaps build into our strivings an awareness of the way our goals promise us a respite and a resolution that they cannot, by definition, deliver.
author: Alain de Botton, Status Anxiety
tags: anxiety, desire, goals, hopes, life, respite

quote: Cemeteries are full of unfulfilled dreams... countless echoes of 'could have' and 'should have'… countless books unwritten… countless songs unsung... I want to live my life in such a way that when my body is laid to rest, it will be a well needed rest from a life well lived, a song well sung, a book well written, opportunities well explored, and a love well expressed.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: body, books, cemetery, dreams, echoes, goals, inspirational, life, live, motivational, rest, songs

quote: Don’t let the agony, regret, or fog of yesterday blind you to the fact that each new day carries with it a plethora of opportunities to move your life into the right direction.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: agony, dreams, fog, goals, life, opportunities, path, regret, success, yesterday

quote: My mother once told me, when you have to make a decision, imagine the person you want to become someday. Ask yourself, what would that person do?
author: Barry  Deutsch, How Mirka Met a Meteorite

quote: If you do what everyone else does, you will get what everyone else gets.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: Each day brings a fresh opportunity for you to set the standard of how dedicated and committed you are to your needs, wants, goals, and relationships.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: commitment, dedication, goals, needs, opportunity, relationships, standard, wants

quote: Stop harboring grudges against those who have wronged you, it just holds you back when you really want to be in the NOW.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: There is nothing more satisfying than having plans.
author: Lalita Tademy, Cane River
tags: dreams-inspirational, future-plans, goals, life, plans, satisfaction

quote: It is necessary to look forward to a harvest, however distant that may be, when some fruit will be reaped, some good effected.
author: Charles Darwin, Voyage of the Beagle

quote: Nobody ever talks about the pyramids that weren't built, the books that weren't written, the songs that weren't sung. Stop letting your fear condemn you to mediocrity. Get out of your own way. Your dreams are a poetic reflection of your soul's wishes. Be courageous enough to follow them. There is no greater time than now to experience the full power of your potential. Make this the day you take the first step in the beautiful journey of bringing your dreams to life.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: books, dreams, experience, fear, goals, journey, life, potential, pyramids, songs, soul, wishes, written

quote: You have to set the time frame for accomplishing your goal. If you don’t, it may take forever to reach your destination and you may get tired and change your focus. Consequently, to help you obtain and keep the sense of urgency that will help you stay focused, you have to set a deadline by which the goal has to be achieved.
author: Anna   Stevens, Turn Your Dreams And Wants Into Achievable SMART Goals!

quote: when you shoot for the stars, you can't ever look back.
author: Brittany Perloff, Starting Over
tags: aspirations, dreaming, dreams, goals, happy, inspirational, reaching-your-goals, shooting-for-the-stars, smile, stars, the-future, the-past

quote: To the man of science, on his unassuming and laborious travels, which must often enough be journeys through the desert, there appear those glittering mirages called 'philosophical systems'; with bewitching deceptive power they show the solution of all enigmas and the freshest draught of the true water of life to be near at hand; his heart rejoices, and it seems to the weary traveller that his lips already touch the goal of all the perseverance and sorrows of the scientific life... Other natures again, may well grow exceedingly ill-humoured and curse the salty taste which these apparitions leave behind in the mouth and from which arises a raging thirst – without one having been brought so much as a step nearer to any kind of spring.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche
tags: deception, enigma, goals, knowledge, mirages, science, solutions, systems

quote: Unzip your life right now, air out the putrid and bleach the infection, then invite your childhood dreams back, beckon the best of you and breathe deeper than you have in a very long time. Believe in the holdings of your heart. You can become anyone and anything your heart desires once you clear the clutter and stuff yourself with positive power and intentions.
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: If you are going to be a doubter, I don't need your negative energy.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, doubt, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: TAKE ACTION! Wanting is not enough; Act upon your goals! If somebody was watching your day-to-day behavior, would they be able to see what you’re working towards; what your goals are? If the answer is no, FIX IT!
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Don’t make excuses; rather, find support and resources to make good things happen for yourself, your family, your businesses, your community, and the world you live in.
author: Anna   Stevens, Turn Your Dreams And Wants Into Achievable SMART Goals!

quote: Many surround themselves with luminaries, but in so doing they dull their own sparkle. If you want to shine bright, look to the heavens and see how the brightest star always stands apart from those lesser shining stars.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: All the answers to your questions about what your goals can and should be lie within, so does your power to accomplish those goals.
author: Anna   Stevens, Turn Your Dreams And Wants Into Achievable SMART Goals!

quote: When the zone calls, you must listen. You never know how long being in the zone lasts.It is a cardinal rule - you must take advantage of every second that you are in the zone.
author: JohnA Passaro, In the Zone and Other Sports Essays

quote: Your life is a reflection of how effectively you balance potential and kinetic energy.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: action, balance, dreams, goals, kinetic-energy, life, potential, reflection, success

quote: Managers’ responsibility is to ensure that people deliver the expected results, which are the company’s strategy. The company’s strategy, in turn, determines its competitive advantage. So, if a manager does a poor job of motivating employees’ productivity, the enterprise is a weak competitor.
author: Anna   Stevens, Turn Your Dreams And Wants Into Achievable SMART Goals!

quote: I recommend that you focus on both substance and process of your goals. I believe that both are equally important: by setting a high-quality SMART goal you will enable yourself to be conscious and your actions will carry more meaning; meanwhile, it is the execution of the SMART goals strategy that separates achievers from the rest of the people.
author: Anna   Stevens, Turn Your Dreams And Wants Into Achievable SMART Goals!
tags: goal, goal-setting, goals, process, smart-goals, substance, success-self-improvement

quote: Success isn't something you have, it's something you do. Don't be fooled into taking shortcuts, they always lead to a dead-end. Instead, establish a goal, make a plan, and take purposeful action. Those who experience success are those who live it; those who earn it.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Man needs what's worst in him in order to achieve what's best in him.
author: Paulo Coelho, The Devil and Miss Prym

quote: Those who speak most of health, have it. Those who speak most of wealth, have it. Those who speak most of joy, have it. The opposite also holds true. So which would you rather have?
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: By fully experiencing and going beyond an emotional block - through the layers of doubt and fear - you experience the emotion of who you truly are.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, emotional-blocks, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-doubt, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: You have two voices, one that only you hear, and another that you speak out loud with, so others hear you. Regardless of what you actually say with your mouth, what matters is what your inner voice says, for this is the one you listen to the most.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: To control your life, control your mind. To control your mind, control your breath.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, control-your-life, control-your-mind, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: No matter what your wishes, they are not crazy so long as they are not crazy to you!
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation, wishes

quote: Make the goal huge and you cannot miss!
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: Excuses are a time thief. Have a goal, accept responsibility, and take action!
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: action, dreams, excuses, goal, goals, happiness, life, responsibility, thief, time

quote: Whatever you do in your life, always go the distance.
author: Ken Norton

quote: Often success goes hand-in-hand with the sum total of sexual activity in your life.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: You have a right to feel the universe is willing to provide you with blessings, but not to the point that it cannot do without you.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, universe, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: You put yourself where you are, and if you find yourself unsatisfied with how you are, then get yourself out of it.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: Your life is in your hands. Only YOU have the capacity to turn it into a rosy path or a thorn filled one. Increase your vibrational output with Cosmic Ordering and your future will be rosy.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: Do not avoid doing what you love because you fear that it will only result in poverty or lack. If you fear this, then this is exactly what will happen.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, poverty, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: The universe is infinite, and the experiences and opportunities available to us are likewise.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, nfinite-universe, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: I think when you begin to think of yourself as having achieved something, then there's nothing left for you to work towards. I want to believe that there is a mountain so high that I will spend my entire life striving to reach the top of it.
author: Cicely Tyson
tags: achievements, goals, life, satisfaction, struggle, working-hard

quote: Armed with positive thoughts, it becomes easier to focus on your goals, while the opposite also holds true.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: Do not constantly question why your desires have not manifested, although you should keep a vibrational connection to them.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, vibrational-connection, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: Harnessing the unique sex energy that can only arise through sexual expression can awaken multidimensional awareness and provide you with your desired goal.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, multidimensional-awareness, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, sex-energy, sexual-expression, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: My goal is to sweep the reader away from his world and bring him along for the adventure. Learning something new shouldn’t feel like work, nor should today’s younger reader be underestimated. If done correctly, there is no need to “dumb down” the plot or simplify words. When someone tells me he thought The Serpent’s Ring was easy to read, I know I succeeded in my storytelling.
author: H.B. Bolton

quote: If you're alive, kick into drive. Chase whimsies. See if you can turn dreams into a way to make a living, if not an entire way of life.
author: Kevin Smith, Tough Shit: Life Advice from a Fat, Lazy Slob Who Did Good

quote: the goal is to keep yourself moving, remember? don't linger. don't hover. you are not going to stay.
author: Terra Elan McVoy, After the Kiss

quote: Give up your dreams
author: you'll accomplish more without sleep.
tags: Bauvard, Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic

quote: You know, you spend your childhood watching TV, assuming that at some point in the future everything you see will one day happen to you: that you too will win a Formula One race, hop a train, foil a group of terrorists, tell someone 'Give me the gun', etc. Then you start secondary school, and suddenly everyone's asking you about your career plans and your long-term goals, and by goals they don't mean the kind you are planning to score in the FA Cup. Gradually the awful truth dawns on you: that Santa Claus was just the tip of the iceberg - that your future will not be the rollercoaster ride you'd imagined,that the world occupied by your parents, the world of washing dishes, going to the dentist, weekend trips to the DIY superstore to buy floor-tiles, is actually largely what people mean when they speak of 'life'.
author: Paul Murray, Skippy Dies

quote: It’s called an ‘accomplishment’, not an ‘intent-ishment’. You’ve got to BE it to SEE it. NO MORE EXCUSES - Decide what you want, create a plan, and get your ass out there!
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: accomplishment, action, dreams, excuses, goals, inspirational, intent, motivational, plan, success

quote: Remember this—the journey is part of the dream.  Whatever it is you're chasing, so long as you are actively moving in the right direction, the dream is coming true.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
tags: ambitions, dreams, goals, perserverance, richelle, richelle-goodrich

quote: Achieving a goal is nothing. The getting there is everything.
author: Jules Michelet

quote: Between here and there is a journey illuminated by the rising and setting of a radiant sun. Don't miss its splendor in your all-fired hurry to cross the finish line.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
tags: determination, dreams, goals, journey, life, richelle, richelle-goodrich

quote: Deciding to commit yourself to long term results rather than short term fixes is as important as any decision you'll make in your lifetime.
author: Anthony Robbins
tags: decisions, goals, inspirational, life, lifetime, results

quote: Thinking about working out burns 0 calories, 0 percentage of fat and accomplishes 0 goals!
author: Gwen Ro
tags: accomplish, accomplishments, exercise, fat, goals, goals-in-life, health, health-and-fitness, healthy, healthy-diet, healthy-living, wellness

quote: I had written a book of short stories which was published under the title of "Uncle Tom's Children". When the review of that book began to appear, I realized that I had made an awful naive mistake. I found that I had written a book which even bankers' daughters could read and weep over and feel good about. I swore to myself that if I ever wrote another book, no one would weep over it; that it would be so hard and deep that they would have to face it without the consolation of tears.
author: Richard Wright, Bigger Thomas

quote: The smart strategist allows strategy to be shaped by events. Good reactions can make great strategy. Strategy involves competition of goals, and the risk is the difference between those goals and the ability of the organization to achieve them. So part of the risk is created by the strategy.
author: Max McKeown, The Strategy Book
tags: entrepreneurship, goals, innovation, leadership, management-and-leadership, risk, strategy

quote: It matters not what goal you seek Its secret here reposesYou've got to dig from week to week To get Results or Roses.
author: Edgar A. Guest

quote: At this age, all we need to do is to "WAIT" in our love life.Set your priorities, Endeavor your goals!
author: Marielle Arias Cleofe

quote: Anytime you announce your dream; two things happen, it's either it motivates you to get it done or the feeling of accomplishment sets in and discourages you from pursuing it
author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quote: Don't throw away another day! No more procrastinating! Only YOU can make it happen. So, UN-ASS the couch and make it happen!
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: couch, dreams, goals, happiness, life, procrastinating, success

quote: Do not ask, "Is is possible?" rather, "Is is worth what it will require of me to make it happen?
author: Toni Sorenson

quote: Any activity where you let go of fears and doubts and inertia, and move toward a goal you desire brings, if not the goal itself (which may or may not be available to you) but brings you a life full of adventure, dedication, excitement and fulfillment – in other words – satisfaction and happiness.
author: Martin Gover, The Simplest Book Ever on Life Attitude and Happiness

quote: As you give to fund God's needs, are you forced to trust Him to provide for yours? That's what a growing faith is about. And over the long haul, it's not enough just to commit to a percentage. Growth means reviewing your giving goals and occasionally increasing the percentage you give.
author: Andy Stanley, Fields Of Gold

quote: Do you have all that you desire? The health, the home, the career or the relationship? Look to where you're investing your time the most, is it dedicated to achieving those desires?
author: Rob Liano

quote: Positive energy is your priceless life force. Protect it. Don't allow people to draw from your reserves; select friends who recharge your energies . . . I'm not asking you to cut people out of your life, but I am asking you to invest your time with people who will push you to be your best. Winners love to see other people win.
author: Chalene Johnson, PUSH: 30 Days to Turbocharged Habits, a Bangin' Body, and the Life You Deserve!
tags: career, diet, fitness, goal-setting, goals, relationships, self-help, success

quote: People do not wander around and then find themselves at the top of Mount Everest.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: While you'll feel compelled to charge forward it's often a gentle step back that will reveal to you where you and what you truly seek.
author: Rasheed Ogunlaru
tags: finding-yourself, fulfilment, goals, happiness, happyness, inspirirational-quotes, life-path, mindfulness, perspective, rasheed-ogunlaru, rushing, self-realization, stepping-back, time, time-out, wisdom

quote: Aim at a high mark and you'll hit it. No, not the first time, nor the second time. Maybe not the third. But keep on aiming and keep on shooting for only practice will make you perfect.
author: Annie Oakley

quote: Goals are my north star.  My compass.  The map that guides me along the road I wish to travel.  Goals are motivations with wind in their sails—they carry me forward despite the storms.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
tags: accomplishment, dreams, drive, goals, hope, inspirational, journey, motivation, perserverance, richelle, richelle-goodrich

quote: An average person with average talent, ambition and education can outstrip the most brilliant genius in our society, if that person has clear, focused goals.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The funny thing about an impossibility is that it tends to be a magnet for those who would prove it otherwise.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Smile Anyway
tags: determination, dreams, fortitude, goals, impossible, inspirational, richelle, richelle-goodrich, trying

quote: Every step towards your dream today is a step away from your regret tomorrow.
author: Steve Maraboli, Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
tags: dreams, goals, inspirational, life, motivational, regret

quote: Tell me your story and I will get back your life.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: Treat yourself like a fat person with aches and pains and a suitcase full of excuses, and good luck--you'll stay exactly where you are. Train like an athlete and, though you may not look like one now, you will become one.
author: Chalene Johnson, PUSH: 30 Days to Turbocharged Habits, a Bangin' Body, and the Life You Deserve!

quote: Successful people do what others know they should do but will not. To become a success, or just be *more* successful, you will do what average, less-motivated people will not.
author: Chalene Johnson, PUSH: 30 Days to Turbocharged Habits, a Bangin' Body, and the Life You Deserve!
tags: career, diet, fitness, goals, self-help, success

quote: Willful blindness sees no end of damage done.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation, wilful-blindness

quote: A tenacious grip on our own ideals, irrespective of hurdles, would propel us towards self-actualization!
author: Deeba Salim Irfan
tags: focus, goal, goal-achievement, goals, hurdles, love-hurts, self-actualization

quote: Entrust your dreams and goals to people who will cheer you on and inspire you, who will tell you what you need to hear rather than what you want to hear so you can move forward and fast track.
author: Rachael Bermingham
tags: advice, dreams, goals, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, supporters

quote: With sticky thinking you can become unstuck!
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, sticky-thinking, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: It's Up to You To Get Your Dreams and Goals Moving
author: Brenda Johnson Padgitt

quote: I want to make a difference, I want to make a change, inspire a revolution, to create, reinvent, and rearrange.
author: Meagan Earls

quote: Perfection is too high a goal to strive for. Sometimes working hard bringsmore satisfaction in the end.
author: Megan Hart, Tempted

quote: Everyone lives a self-centered life...whether its trivial like what's for breakfast, or more ambitious, like achieving some lofty goal, a person is constantly on her own mind.
author: T.M. Goeglein, Cold Fury

quote: Aim at the ground, you'll never miss.
author: Kristine Thomas

quote: If you want to make dough, do a bun dance.
author: Stephen Richards
tags: abundance, abundance-creation, author-stephen-richards, cosmic-ordering, fearless, focus, goal-setting, goals, happiness, law-of-attraction, life-changing, make-dough, manifestation, manifesting, metaphysical, millionaire-mindset, mind-body-spirit, mind-power, money, new-age, new-age-movement, new-thought, opportunities, opportunity, positive-thought, positive-thoughts, positivity, self-belief, self-growth, self-help, self-limiting-beliefs, self-motivation, self-realization, spiritual, spirituality, stephen-richards, success, synchronicity, visualization, wealth-creation

quote: Your goals and dreams will never happen if you don't Sow Labor Into Time
author: Brenda Johnson Padgitt
tags: dreams, goals, labor, sow, time, time-management

quote: There are several paths to success
author: We are given multiple opportunities to achieve our potential throughout our lives. Some get there a little faster than others. But one thing is for sure
tags: NO ONE gets there without first having a goal then taking action and LOTS of it!

quote: It is a rare goal that has only one path.
author: Carma Spence

quote: After a few months of talking with people and observing them, I realized that the traits of the successful fitness enthusiasts had everything in common with those of the high achievers I had spent years studying in business.
author: Chalene Johnson, PUSH: 30 Days to Turbocharged Habits, a Bangin' Body, and the Life You Deserve!
tags: career, diet, fitness, goals, lifestyle, success

quote: Treat yourself like a fast person with aches and pains and a suitcase full of excuses, and good luck--you'll stay exactly where you are. Train like an athlete and, though you may not look like one now, you will become one." --Push: 30 Days to Turbocharged Habits, p. 214
author: Chalene Johnson, PUSH: 30 Days to Turbocharged Habits, a Bangin' Body, and the Life You Deserve!
tags: advice, career, diet, fitness, goals, health, self-help

quote: A self is not something static, tied up in a pretty parcel and handed to the child, finished and complete. A self is always becoming.
author: Madeleine L'Engle, A Circle of Quiet

quote: It is not for me to judge another man's life. I must judge, I must choose, I must spurn, purely for myself. For myself, alone.
author: Hermann Hesse, Siddhartha
tags: choices, focus, humility, judgement, judgemental, self, tolerance

quote: The greatest hazard of all, losing one’s self, can occur very quietly in the world, as if it were nothing at all. No other loss can occur so quietly; any other loss - an arm, a leg, five dollars, a wife, etc. - is sure to be noticed.
author: Søren Kierkegaard, The Sickness Unto Death: A Christian Psychological Exposition for Upbuilding and Awakening

quote: If you feel lost, disappointed, hesitant, or weak, return to yourself, to who you are, here and now and when you get there, you will discover yourself, like a lotus flower in full bloom, even in a muddy pond, beautiful and strong.
author: Masaru Emoto, Secret Life of Water
tags: arrival, beautiful, bloom, disappointed, discover, here, hesitant, lost, lotus-flower, now, return, self, strong, weak, yourself

quote: I am only one, but I am one. I cannot do everything, but I can do something. And because I cannot do everything, I will not refuse to do the something that I can do.
author: Edward Everett Hale
tags: ability, accomplishment, confidence, determination, self, self-esteem

quote: We don't realize that, somewhere within us all, there does exist a supreme self who is eternally at peace.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert, Eat, Pray, Love

quote: You are a function of what the whole universe is doing in the same way that a wave is a function of what the whole ocean is doing.
author: Alan W. Watts

quote: Was everyone else really as alive as she was?... If the answer was yes, then the world, the social world, was unbearably complicated, with two billion voices, and everyone’s thoughts striving in equal importance and everyone’s claim on life as intense, and everyone thinking they were unique, when no one was. One could drown in irrelevance.
author: Ian McEwan, Atonement

quote: We all wear masks, and the time comes when we cannot remove them without removing some of our own skin.
author: André Berthiaume

quote: I take pleasure in my transformations. I look quiet and consistent, but few know how many women there are in me.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: Through our eyes, the universe is perceiving itself. Through our ears, the universe is listening to its harmonies. We are the witnesses through which the universe becomes conscious of its glory, of its magnificence.
author: Alan W. Watts

quote: I stop fighting my inner demons. We're on the same side now. T-shirt
author: Darynda Jones, Second Grave on the Left

quote: Gaze into the fire, into the clouds, and as soon as the inner voices begin to speak... surrender to them. Don't ask first whether it's permitted, or would please your teachers or father or some god. You will ruin yourself if you do that.
author: Hermann Hesse, Demian. Die Geschichte von Emil Sinclairs Jugend

quote: As long as you can find yourself, you’ll never starve.
author: Suzanne Collins, The Hunger Games

quote: A friend is a gift you give yourself.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The better you feel about yourself, the less you feel the need to show off.
author: Robert Hand
